definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

sentences.english: "The Nutcracker" is one of the most popular ballets in the world.
sentences.chinese: “胡桃夾子”是世界上最著名的芭蕾舞劇之一。

sentences.english: Deciding whether to use Hickory Woodlots or Forests is a debate outside the content of this article.
sentences.chinese: 使用山胡桃植林地或者是樹林不在本文討論之列。

sentences.english: The kernel of the walnut is eaten by itself or used in cakes or cookies.
sentences.chinese: 胡桃仁可以直接食用或者用與蛋糕或餅乾中。

sentences.english: This table is made of walnut.
sentences.chinese: 這張桌子是胡桃木做的。

sentences.english: This box is made of walnut.
sentences.chinese: 這個箱子是胡桃木做的。

sentences.english: The clogs were made in one piece of the trunks of walnut trees which formed a rectangle with its roots.
sentences.chinese: 木底鞋用一整塊根部呈長方形的胡桃樹的樹幹製成。
門框同樣爲深色的胡桃木。

sentences.english: The squirrel stashes away nuts for winter.
sentences.chinese: 松鼠貯藏胡桃以備過冬。

sentences.english: The results showed that the optimum ultrasound extraction conditions for juglone were as follows:extraction time was 1.
sentences.chinese: 採用響應面法優化超聲波提取胡桃楸中胡桃醌的條件。

sentences.english: The results showed that the optimum ultrasound extraction conditions for juglone were as follows:extraction time was 1.
sentences.chinese: 採用響應面法優化超聲波提取胡桃楸中胡桃醌的條件。

sentences.english: He offers it to the princess to eat, and her beauty is restored.
sentences.chinese: 他將胡桃呈獻給公主喫，於是公主恢復了美麗。

sentences.english: A walnut sundae,and don't spare the whipped cream.
sentences.chinese: 做胡桃聖代冰淇淋，就甭想少用摜奶漬。

sentences.english: The meat of the walnut can be used in cakes.
Molkenkur and Nussloch are in completely opposite directions.
sentences.chinese: 摩爾根療養院和胡桃衚衕是完全相反的方向。

sentences.english: He slowly chewed the nuts, ignoring the bear completely.
sentences.chinese: 他慢慢地嚼着胡桃仁，完全不理那隻熊。

sentences.english: If there are no depletion counters on Hickory Woodlot, sacrifice it.
sentences.chinese: 若山胡桃植林地上沒有消耗指示物，則犧牲之。

definition: peach kernel, used in Chinese medicine
